about.title: Built for One Clear Purpose
about.intro: Zaynan Lana is a content-driven marketing and production company built for one clear purpose:
about.purpose: To serve brands, entities, and initiatives working in religious and faith-based content.
about.p1: We are not a general agency. We are a specialized partner that understands the sensitivity, depth, and responsibility behind this type of content — whether it's educational, spiritual, awareness-driven, or community-focused.
about.p2: Our work blends strategy, creativity, and technology to produce meaningful content that connects with people emotionally and culturally.
about.p3: From storytelling to production, from campaigns to data — we handle the full journey under one roof.
about.closingLead: Because for us… content in this field is not just marketing.

vision.statement: To become the leading content and production partner in the religious and faith-based industry across the region.
vision.description: We believe religious content deserves the same level of creativity, innovation, and professionalism as any global industry — while preserving its values, message, and authenticity.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
content: Welcome to Zaynan Lana.
We respect your privacy and are committed to protecting any personal information you may provide while using our website.
This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information.
This website operates from Lebanon.

sections.title: 2. Information We Collect
content: We may collect the following information when you use our website:
A. Information You Provide Voluntarily
When you submit a contact form, we may collect:
Your name
Your email address
Your message
We do not store this information in a database. It is used only to respond to your inquiry.
B. Automatically Collected Information
When you visit our website, certain data may be collected automatically, including:
IP address
Browser type
Device information
Pages visited
Time and date of visit
This data helps us understand how visitors use our website.

sections.title: 3. Use of Google Analytics
content: We use Google Analytics to analyze website traffic and improve our services.
Google Analytics may collect:
IP address
Device and browser information
Website usage data
This information is processed according to Google’s privacy policies.
You can opt out of Google Analytics tracking by using the Google Analytics Opt-out Browser Add-on.

sections.title: 4. How We Use Your Information
content: We use collected information to:
Respond to contact inquiries
Improve website performance
Monitor traffic and usage trends
Ensure website security
We do not sell, trade, or rent your personal information.

sections.title: 5. Data Protection
content: We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your information from unauthorized access, misuse, or disclosure.
However, no method of transmission over the internet is 100% secure.

sections.title: 6. Third-Party Services
content: Our website may use third-party services (such as hosting providers and analytics tools) that may process data on our behalf.
These providers have their own privacy policies.

sections.title: 7. Your Rights
content: Depending on your location, you may have the right to:
Request access to your personal data
Request correction or deletion of your data
Object to certain types of data processing
To exercise these rights, please contact us through the website.

sections.title: 8. Changes to This Policy
content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Updates will be posted on this page with a revised effective date.

sections.title: 9. Contact Us
content: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact us through the website contact form.
